A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know whether to cry or scream in anger over how much I hated this movie. Star Wars has been officially ruined. Characters were killed off ridiculously while others lived that should have died. The force apparently has new rules. Screen time was hogged by characters no one gives a shit about. I won't be wasting money seeing the third installment. I'd rather pretend Star Wars ended with George Lucas. The only exception of this would be Rogue One because it felt like an actual Star Wars movie. Too bad there aren't more installments of that story line.
